FuncDef:
The mpls p2mp slot command configures an MPLS P2MP loopback board.
The undo mpls p2mp slot command deletes the configuration.
By default, the system automatically selects an MPLS P2MP loopback board.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the slot ID of an MPLS P2MP loopback board.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The bud node on an MPLS P2MP tunnel connects to a client-side device, so that the bud node is the egress a sub-LSP and also an intermediate node of other sub-LSPs. On the bud node, a loopback board is needed to export traffic to be sent to the client-side device. By default, the system automatically selects an MPLS P2MP loopback board. To specify a loopback board for the bud node on an MPLS P2MP tunnel, run the mpls p2mp slot command to implement centralized control over loopback traffic to be sent to the client-side device.
Precautions
This command applies only to boards that support VPLS OVER P2MP.
